channel.title: Chinese on Foodie Diary
channel.description: Recent content in Chinese on Foodie Diary

item.title: Ma Po Toufu
item.description: Serves: 2-3 Ingredients Silken Tofu: 1 lb 4 oz or 567 g Pork: 100 to 250 g (optional) Chili Oil: 2 tsp Fermented Black Beans: 2 tbsp Dou Ban Jiang: 2 1/2 tbsp Red Pepper Powder/Chili Powder: 1 tbsp Ginger: 1 1/2 tsp Garlic: 4 to 5 cloves or 1 1/2 tbsp Spring Onion: 3 sprigs Soy Sauce: 1 tsp Sesame Oil: 1 tsp Chicken/Vegetable Stock or Water: 1 cup or 237 mL Potato Starch: 1 tsp Water: 1 tsp Method
